definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: Interphase is divisible into various stages each characterized by a differing physiological activity.
sentences.chinese: 根据细胞生理活性差异可以把间期分成不同的阶段。

sentences.english: They may also have personality differences which can cause conflict.
sentences.chinese: 他们所具有的个性差异也可能会引起冲突。

sentences.english: However, there was no significant difference in the lowest SaO2 between the two groups.
sentences.chinese: 两组之间最低血氧饱和度的差异无显著性意义。

sentences.english: The window of opportunity is shrinking, and differentiation is harder to claim.
sentences.chinese: 机会之窗正在变小，差异化更难断言。

sentences.english: About gender and race differences in self-concept.
sentences.chinese: 自我概念上的性别差异和种族差异。

sentences.english: About gender and race differences in self-concept.
sentences.chinese: 自我概念上的性别差异和种族差异。

sentences.english: Moreover, differences also exist between the pitch radius increasing phases and pitch radius decreasing phases.
sentences.chinese: 此外，这种差异也存在于节径增加和节径减少阶段。

sentences.english: Contrastive Rhetoric (CR) studies the differences of discourse patterns across languages and cultures.
sentences.chinese: 对比修辞研究不同语言及文化间的语篇模式差异。

sentences.english: It has the biggest gap on the audience's satisfaction with comfort of spaces.
sentences.chinese: 观赏者对各设施空间舒适与气氛满意度之差异性较大。

sentences.english: We'd like to discuss the details of the contract, especially discrepancy and claim.
sentences.chinese: 我们想讨论合同的各项细目，特别是差异和索赔。

sentences.english: Despite their many differences, there is a remarkable degree of homogeneity among them.
sentences.chinese: 他们的差异点虽多，但其间亦有极大的同质点。

sentences.english: Dr Sivak said this might be due to height difference between the sexes.
sentences.chinese: 西瓦克博士说，这可能是由男女身高的差异造成的。

sentences.english: Expressing opinions is one example of culture difference between east and west.
sentences.chinese: 表达观点的不同是中西文化差异的一个典型例子。

sentences.english: This difference is caused by different attributes of English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 它们的差异是由英汉语不同的语言属性决定的。

sentences.english: There was no significant difference in self- concept between two sub -groups with different age in left -behind children.
sentences.chinese: 不同年龄组留守儿童的自我意识比较无显著性差异。

sentences.english: Results The index above increased significantly in SBG protective group.
sentences.chinese: 结果黄芩保护组与染毒组比较有显著性差异，P。

definition: difference/to distinguish/to discriminate/to make a distinction/CL:個|个[ge4]
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
